For the egg-fried rice: 100g/3½oz long grain rice, cooked according to packet instructions
For the marinated beef: 100g/3½oz rump steak, cut into thin slices
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the marinated beef, place the beef into a bowl along with the soy sauce, sesame oil and lime zest and juice and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Leave to marinate for at least five minutes, ideally 30 minutes.

Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a high heat, place the marinated beef into the pan and stir fry for 2-3 minutes, or until cooked to your liking. Remove from the heat and set aside in a warm place.
For the egg-fried rice, heat the vegetable oil in a wok, add the beaten eggs and stir well to cook the eggs quickly.
Add the cooked rice, peas and sesame oil to the wok, stir well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
To serve, transfer the rice to a bowl, top with the beef and drizzle over the soy sauce.
title: Marinated beef with egg-fried rice
